title: Friedrich Friedl
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011092144/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011092144/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : Friedrich Friedl**

Professor for Typography at the German [HfG Offenbach](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011092144/http:/typophile.com/wiki/HfG%20Offenbach). Author of the enormous _Typography_.
author: paul d hunt
